title: 'Numerous arrests' made following major disturbance outside Kiss Haunted House party
text:
Police have ordered revelers at a pre-Halloween party at Wembley Arena to 'disperse' following major disturbances following the event.

Numerous people have been arrested after the Kiss Haunted House event at Wembley Arena.

Scotland Yard said the incident is still ongoing and they do not have a complete total on the number of people arrested.

Police raced to the scene of a major disturbance following the Kiss Haunted House Party in Wembley Arena last night

The Kiss Haunted House Party was headlined by Stormzy who performed on stage

Footage captured on Empire Way in Wembley showed a line of police cars and vans heading towards the arena.

Officers told people in the area to disperse towards Wembley Central and Wembley Park tube stations while they dealt with the trouble makers.

The sold-out event was headlined by Stormzy.

More to follow.
description: Police have ordered revellers at a pre-Halloween party at Wembley Arena to 'disperse' following major disturbances following the event headlined by Stormzy.
